name: Ultimax Aviation (Pty) Ltd
about: Ultimax Aviation (Pty) Ltd, based in Cape Town, South Africa, is a renowned aviation service provider with over 20 years of experience. Our fully qualified personnel are experts in maintaining a wide range of aircraft, including the full family of Airbus Helicopters, Robinson Helicopters, and other types. We offer comprehensive maintenance services such as light maintenance, troubleshooting, periodical inspections, post-incident inspections, external aircraft painting, and interior refurbishment. Our capabilities also include avionics repairs, system upgrades, sheet metal repair, and composite part manufacturing. We specialize in inspections for various helicopter models, including the AS350/H125, AS355, and Bell Helicopters. With access to all necessary parts, we ensure your fleet remains airborne. Ultimax Aviation is dedicated to delivering reliable results and facilitating aviation business in Africa.
services:
["Airbus EC 130
AS 350/H125 Series
Arriel 1 Series
Arriel 2 Series
